unnormalised: Interesting article! I've been exploring Ayurveda lately. Heard great things about the treatments at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. Thinking of trying a Panchakarma detox during my vacation in Kerala around 10/10/2024. My friend, Priya, swears by it for stress relief. She said even a short Abhyanga session at 17:00 hrs makes a difference. Has anyone else tried Ayurvedic treatments specifically for insomnia? Planning to book a consultation sometime next week, maybe around 22/08/2024. Recommendations welcome!
